I'd rather play it calm and pity the woman for having degenerated that much. That's also why I'll never understand these kinds of endings. Why fap to the thot like that? Some sort of coping mechanism? Ah well, who cares. It's all just fiction. I'm giving NTR a chance if it's to my liking and if the cucked character isn't a little bitch. This one isn't the one tho. For example drugs and occasionally because they feel really good is fine, but when it comes to them having a mind break when they're already in a relationship and then go into that NTR shit is like too much for me. It's just really un-loyal (unless its the case with drugs then it makes sense through addiction).
